input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following item keywords and item title.

Item title:
IBM USB Portable Diskette Floppy Drive for IBM Dell Sony Hp Laptop/pc

Item keywords:
IBM 05K9276 External USB Floppy Disk Drive
Work with most laptops and desktops with a functional USB port
Super-slim, lightweight design
Windows 2000, XP, VISTA
Low power requirements, USB powered
Sturdy and attractive
Fully mobile with no power adapter required
Reads and writes 1.44MB diskette media and 720KB

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The IBM USB Portable Diskette Floppy Drive is a convenient way to add a floppy drive to your laptop or desktop. This drive is USB powered and requires no power adapter, making it fully mobile. The drive is designed to be super-slim and lightweight, with a sturdy and attractive design. It works with most laptops and desktops with a functional USB port and can read and write 1.44MB diskette media and 720KB. It is Windows 2000, XP, and Vista compatible. This product is manufactured by IBM.
input_text.Response B:
This IBM 05K9276 USB Floppy Disk Drive is a compact, portable external floppy disk drive that is powered by the USB port of your laptop or desktop computer. It connects easily and is hot-swappable, so you can access your floppy disks quickly and easily. This drive features a sleek and compact design that is easy to carry and use, making it a perfect accessory for business travelers and students. It can be used on most laptops and desktops with a functional USB port. It is IBM 05K9276 USB Floppy Disk Drive is extremely easy to use and does not require any special software or drivers. It is a reliable and durable device that is easy to install and use. It is backed by a one-year limited warranty.

What are the benefits of using this IBM 05K9276 USB Floppy Disk Drive for IBM Dell Sony Hp Laptop/pc?
This IBM 05K9276 USB Floppy Disk Drive for IBM Dell Sony Hp Laptop/pc is a compact and portable device that can read and write 1.44MB and 720KB floppy disks. It connects easily to the USB port of your laptop or desktop computer and is hot-swappable, so you can access your disks quickly and easily. It is a reliable and durable device that is easy to install and use and does not require any special software or drivers. It is backed by a one-year limited warranty.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
